original: @341a # // bcom ldan @341b 'das la lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyis bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa //
analyzed: @341a # // bcom ldan @341b 'das la lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyis bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa //
translated: The Blessed One, the god Indra, the lord of the Heaven of Joy, with verses of auspiciousness:

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: Whatever is the supreme auspiciousness

original: chags pa med pa'i zla bar mtshan gsol mtshan btags pa //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i zla bar mtshan gsol mtshan btags pa //
translated: By which the one named Moon of Non-Attachment was named,

original: pho brang mchog tu rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: pho brang mchog tu rab gshegs pa //
translated: Who went forth to the supreme palace,

original: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: By that, may there be auspiciousness here! Whatever is the supreme auspiciousness

original: ye shes mtha' yas dbang zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa //
analyzed: ye shes mtha' yas dbang zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa //
translated: By which the one named Lord of Boundless Wisdom was named,

original: kha dog gser du rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: kha dog gser du rab gshegs pa //
translated: Who went forth as the color of gold,

original: des ni 'di yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: des ni 'di yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: By that, may there be auspiciousness here! Whatever is the supreme auspiciousness

original: kun du mtha' yas spyan zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa //
analyzed: kun du mtha' yas spyan zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa //
translated: By which the one named Eyes of Boundless Space was named,

original: padmo'i rtse mor rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: padmo'i rtse mor rab gshegs pa //
translated: Who went forth to the peak of the lotus,

original: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: By that, may there be auspiciousness here! Whatever is the supreme auspiciousness

original: yan lag rin po che zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa //
analyzed: yan lag rin po che zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa //
translated: He was given the name Ratnamudrāhasta.

original: rin chen mdzod du rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: rin chen mdzod du rab gshegs pa //
translated: When he entered the treasury of jewels,

original: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
analyzed: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
translated: may there be auspiciousness and goodness here!

original: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: Whatever is the sublime auspiciousness

original: dpal rab rgol ba'i stag ces bya bar mtshan btags pa //
analyzed: dpal rab rgol ba'i stag ces bya bar mtshan btags pa //
translated: by which he was given the name Śrī-Ugratejas-vyūha,

original: dbang po'i khang par rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: dbang po'i khang par rab gshegs pa //
translated: when he entered the palace of Indra,🔽may there be auspiciousness and goodness here!

original: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: Whatever is the sublime auspiciousness

original: yon tan thams cad ston pa'i nyi mar mtshan btags pa //
analyzed: yon tan thams cad ston pa'i nyi mar mtshan btags pa //
translated: by which he was given the name Sarva-guṇa-prabhāsa-sūrya,

original: me tog snying por rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: me tog snying por rab gshegs pa //
translated: when he entered the heart of the flower,🔽may there be auspiciousness and goodness here!

original: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: Whatever is the sublime auspiciousness

original: yan lag 'od zer mtha' yas par ni mtshan btags pa //
analyzed: yan lag 'od zer mtha' yas par ni mtshan btags pa //
translated: by which he was given the name Anantamudrāṅkura,

original: shing gis brgyan par rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: shing gis brgyan par rab gshegs pa //
translated: when he entered the forest adorned with trees,

original: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: may there be auspiciousness and goodness here!

original: mgon po the tshom 'joms pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan de //
analyzed: mgon po the tshom 'joms pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan de //
translated: The protector Dharmaketu, the destroyer of doubt,

original: rin chen khang par rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: rin chen khang par rab gshegs pa //
translated: Having entered the precious house,🔽May all be auspicious and excellent here!

original: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: Whatever is the supreme auspiciousness

original: mi yi seng ge ye shes sgron ma mtha' yas pa //
analyzed: mi yi seng ge ye shes sgron ma mtha' yas pa //
translated: Of the lion among men, the lamp of infinite wisdom,

original: spos kyi rtse mor rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: spos kyi rtse mor rab gshegs pa //
translated: Having gone to the peak of incense,🔽May all be auspicious and excellent here!

original: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
translated: Whatever is the supreme auspiciousness

original: sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'od mnga' ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'od mnga' ba //
translated: Of the one possessing light, the source of all the qualities of the Buddha,

original: nor bus brgyan par rab gshegs pa //🔽des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan @342a * //
analyzed: nor bus brgyan par rab gshegs pa // des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig / ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan @342a * //
translated: Having gone to the ornament of jewels,🔽May all be auspicious and excellent here!

original: gyis bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa'o //
analyzed: gyis bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa'o //
translated: This is the praise with auspicious verses by the king of gods Suyāma to the Blessed One.

original: sangs rgyas phal po che las gsungs pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o /
analyzed: sangs rgyas phal po che las gsungs pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o /
translated: It is the auspicious verses spoken in the Buddhâvataṃsaka.
